title: Aubergine Parmigiano
ingredients: ['500g (16 oz) dried breadcrumbs', '1 teaspoon dried basil', '1 teaspoon dried oregano', '1 teaspoon dried parsley', '3 aubergines, peeled and thinly sliced', '2 eggs, beaten', '3 (500g) jars tomato pasta sauce, divided', '450g (16 oz) mozzarella, grated and divided', '75g (2.5 oz) grated Parmesan, divided', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil']
